Plot: Five friends go for a break at a remote cabin in the woods, where they get more than they bargained for. Together, they must discover the truth behind the cabin in the woods.
Title: The Cabin in the Woods
Actors: Kristen Connolly, Chris Hemsworth, Anna Hutchison, Fran Kranz
tomatoConsensus: The Cabin in the Woods is an astonishing meta-feat, capable of being funny, strange, and scary -- frequently all at the same time.
